SubModule_Description: To use the Light Matrix module add the following import statement to your project:

Function.Function_Description: Display one of the built in images on the display.

Parameters.Argument_Description: The id of the image to show. The range of available images is 1 to 67. There are consts on      the light_matrix module for these.

Python_Code.Python_Code:
from hub import light_matrix
# Update pixels to show an image on Light Matrix using the show_image function 

# Show a smiling face 
light_matrix.show_image(light_matrix.IMAGE_HAPPY)
Python_Code.Python_Description: Display one of the built in images on the display.
